Articles.Content:
Yeah, everyone's forgotten this and gone for Skillful or BahumotoD's Armoury.

panzer had real life issues and i cant code so it was dropped

If someone would just do a .CFG file edit like with 1.0.2's Kerbonov Pack continued, then release it, it would be downloaded right when I found it, because i loved this mod, and I'm kinda tired of playing with BDA or mods that need BDA to create fighters in space (After all, BDA is mainly based on fighting on Kerbin, which kinda ruins the whole space thing, don't you think), BDA is good and all, but I really want a simple weapons mod aimed for more a versatile use of its weapons, not a complex mod for building jet fighters and other on world vehicles.

So Please, will SOMEONE do a .cfg file edit or someone who knows coding please edit it so it works?

(Reply to answer question)

- - - Updated - - -

Also Joshwoo69

Mods can we close this thread?

ummm, what if someone wants to continue the mod?
seeing if i can CFG edit well enough
